academic_projects.title: University Schedule Management Bot
academic_projects.description: A Telegram bot that helps students and faculty check daily lecture schedules and availability.
academic_projects.outcome: Improved accessibility and reduced confusion about class timings.

academic_projects.title: Top 10 News
academic_projects.description: A web app that displays the top 10 news from various sources in a user-friendly interface in real-time.
academic_projects.outcome: Enhanced user engagement and information accessibility.
